summary: "Edward Scissorhands" is a 1990 American fantasy film directed by Tim Burton. It's about a man named Edward, who has scissors instead of hands, and is taken in by a family. Edward falls in love with their teenage daughter. The film is based on Burton's memories of growing up in the suburbs. It was a big success, making more than four times its budget and winning many awards. Burton and the film's composer, Danny Elfman, consider it their favorite work.
title: Edward Scissorhands
